data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Filellum Hincks, 1868 (Lafoeidae, Leptothecata, Hydrozoa)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marques, Antonio C., Peña, Álvaro L., Miranda, Thaís P., Migotto, Alvaro E. (2011): Revision of the genus Filellum Hincks, 1868 (Lafoeidae, Leptothecata, Hydrozoa). Zootaxa 3129: 1-28, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206783
